title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.2 - Unit of measurement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 60.2 - Unit of measurement

State Regulations

Every odometer shall indicate distance traveled by a
vehicle in miles unless the odometer shows clearly that it measures distance
traveled in kilometers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
60.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
